text: Bamwe mu bemera banze kujya ku rugamba badafite impamvu, ntibahwanye n’abaharanira inzira ya Allah bakoresheje imitungo yabo n’ubuzima bwabo. Allah yahaye urwego rwisumbuye abaharanira inzira ye bakoresheje imitungo yabo n’ubuzima bwabo, kurenza abanze kujya ku rugamba. Kandi buri wese (abajya ku rugamba n’abatajyayo bafite impamvu) Allah yabasezeranyije ibyiza, ariko abaharanira inzira ya Allah, yabahaye urwego rwisumbuye kurusha abatagiye ku rugamba, maze abahemba ibihembo bihambaye
